verses.verse: I will lift up <S%H5375><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> to the hills. <S%H2022><s%> Where <S%H370><s%> does my help <S%H5828><s%> come from? <S%H935><s%>
My help <S%H5828><s%> comes from Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth. <S%H776><s%>
He will not allow <S%H5414><s%> your foot <S%H7272><s%> to be moved. <S%H4132><s%> He who keeps <S%H8104><s%> you will not slumber. <S%H5123><s%>
Behold, <S%H8104><s%> he who keeps Israel <S%H3478><s%> will neither slumber <S%H5123><s%> nor sleep. <S%H3462><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is your keeper. <S%H8104><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is your shade <S%H6738><s%> on your right <S%H3225><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>
The sun <S%H8121><s%> will not harm <S%H5221><s%> you by day, <S%H3119><s%> nor the moon <S%H3394><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will keep <S%H8104><s%> you from all evil. <S%H7451><s%> He will keep <S%H8104><s%> your soul. <S%H5315><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will keep <S%H8104><s%> your going out <S%H3318><s%> and your coming in, <S%H935><s%> from this time forth, <S%H5704><s%> and forevermore. <S%H5769><s%>
